item.title: Footage Cleanup Needed For Documentary - Upwork
item.description:
I'm almost done with a feature length documentary. I have several clips of footage where there are specks/dust marks visible that were on the lens or sensor when shooting. I need someone who knows how to remove these. There are some moving shots where it is present and some stationary shots.

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 21, 2024 13:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Rotoscoping, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Rotoscoping, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
